x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/idoc"

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Input search, can be first name, last name, both or popularity.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars" 
    -d "first_name"="Dany" \
    -d "last_name"="Bitard" \
    -d "popularity"="69" \
    -d "description"=""

data.description: Debitis ipsum consequatur quaerat recusandae aperiam harum. Nisi qui qui qui est placeat. Ad et impedit delectus itaque. Officia ipsam et quibusdam placeat quia vero. Optio sapiente velit voluptas est odio. Ratione dolor sapiente aut occaecati quia.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars/{star}"

curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars/{star}" 
    -d "first_name"="Dany" \
    -d "last_name"="Bitard" \
    -d "popularity"="69" \
    -d "description"=""
curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars/{star}"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/v1/stars/{star}/face" 
    -d "image"=""
